/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the world around them. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses in motion, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the scene. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking up at the towering buildings, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
